articles.title: Pyongyangites Meet to Congratulate Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Meet to Congratulate Kim Jong Un
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Pyongyang citizens took place at Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Thursday to extend congratulations to the dear respected Kim Jong Un on his holding of the title of the DPRK Marshal.
					 Attending it were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae and Hyon Yong Chol, leading officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials in the fields of science, education, literature, arts, public health and media as well as heroes, persons of merits, citizens, youth and students, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, read out a decision of the C.C., the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on awarding the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 All the participants broke into thunderous cheers in excitement with happiness of being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation and with the feelings of congratulation to the great Songun brilliant commander. 
					
					 On behalf of the WPK, Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, took the floor.
					
					 He said that the awarding of the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un is a manifestation of the boundless respect and loyalty of the army and people for him who brings earlier a bright future of building a prosperous nation shouldering upon himself the destiny of the party and the revolution, the country and the people.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the sun of Songun Korea and matchless general of Mt. Paektu who has upheld the idea and cause of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and performed immortal feats in the development of the revolution of our party with his outstanding and experienced leadership. 
					
					 Thanks to the great leadership of Kim Jong Un, the WPK has developed into the glorious Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's party and the powerful guiding force of Songun revolution.
					
					 On behalf of servicepersons, Colonel General Yun Tong Hyon said that the awarding of the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un is an auspicious event that makes an ardent desire of all the army and people come true.
					
					 Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un has regarded it as his lifelong mission to accomplish the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche and ushered in a heyday of increasing nation's capability, he said, and added:
					
					 It is the noble mission and duty of the servicepersons of the People's Army, the army of the leader and the party, to achieve the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche at an early date, rallied close around Kim Jong Un with one and the same thought. 
					
					 On behalf of the workers, Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, said that today's event is an auspicious one of the sun's nation and an important political event of great significance in the struggle for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 It has been the tradition of the DPRK workers to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution, break the deadlock and work miracles of history, rallied close around the party, he added.
					
					 On behalf of agricultural working people, Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers, made a speech.
					
					 All the agricultural working people are firmly convinced of the bright future of socialist rural construction under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Un, he noted.
					
					 He vowed to bring about a turn in this year's agricultural production, keeping in mind the noble intention of Kim Jong Un, who is determined to make the people live in splendor, not tightening their belts again.
					
					 On behalf of youth and students, Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said that they will become human bombs who devotedly defend Kim Jong Un, the banner of all the victories and glory, like strong fortress and shields.
					
					 They will straightly follow the road of the revolution, absolutely believing in Marshal Kim Jong Un, he stressed. 
					
					 A resolution was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: KPISF Service Personnel Vow to Display Its Might under Leadership of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
KPISF Service Personnel Vow to Display Its Might under Leadership of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) met Wednesday to extend the highest glory and congratulations to Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un on his holding of the title of the DPRK Marshal, and vow to uphold his leadership with loyalty.
					 A joint decision of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on awarding the title of the DPRK Marshal to him was read out at the meeting.
					
					 The floor was taken by Ri Myong Su, minister of People's Security, KPISF Generals Yun Hui Hwan and Ri Hi Su and non-commissioned officer Kim Chol Hun.
					
					 The speakers offered the highest glory and the warmest congratulations to Marshal Kim Jong Un, reflecting the excited feelings of all the KPISF service personnel upon the joyous news of holding him in high esteem as Marshal of the DPRK.
					
					 They said that the title awarded to him is a token of absolute trust and loyalty of the whole army and all the people and an event of great significance in ushering in a new heyday of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 With Kim Jong Un held in high esteem at the highest post of the party, state and army, the Korean revolution could firmly ensure the purity and continuity despite the grim tempests of history, give full play to the invincible might of Korean-style socialism and open a grand history of another 100 years of Juche era, they noted.
					
					 They said he is a peerlessly great man and the great sun of Songun Korea who is leading the revolutionary cause of Juche and the Songun revolutionary cause to a brilliant victory with his distinguished political ability and noble leadership trait.
					
					 All the KPISF service personnel will concentrate all efforts in their work for people's security upon inheriting the tradition of devotedly defending the leader and more thoroughly establish the monolithic commanding system of the supreme commander in the whole army, they said.
					
					 They will ensure the absolute authority and prestige of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu in every way and reliably defend the single-minded unity of all the service personnel and people in order to cope with the grave situation in which the enemies have gone reckless, daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, they added.
					
					 A resolution was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 The participants in the meeting held a dancing party in reflection of the unanimous minds of all the service personnel of the KPISF extending the greatest glory and congratulations to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Youth and students Thursday had dancing parties at the gymnasiums of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology and the Central Youth Hall in celebration of the historic event of awarding the title of DPRK Marshal to the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 They began with the playing of song "Confetti of best wishes".
					
					 The youth and students danced, extending the greatest glory and warm congratulations to Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is creditably accomplishing the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche and bringing about a rosy future of the prosperity, shouldering upon himself the destiny of the Party, the revolution, the country and the people.
					
					 They danced to the tunes of "Our leader enjoying love from people", "Glory to our great party", "Let's drink a toast" and other songs.
					
					 Songs like "The country I am defending", "Nilliri for Songun", etc. added to the festive mood.
					
					 The dancing parties showed the firm faith and will of the young vanguard to fully display their honor as the reserve combat unit and detached force of the supreme commander in the present advance of great surge, close rallied around him in one mind.

articles.title: Servicepersons Offer Glory to Marshal Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Servicepersons Offer Glory to Marshal Kim Jong Un
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The servicepersons of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) offer highest glory and warm felicitations to Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un on having received the title of Marshal of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Pak Chol, an officer of KPISF, told KCNA:
					
					 "The conferment of the title of DPRK Marshal on Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un is a national auspicious event.
					
					 He, identical to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, is a brilliant Songun commander.
					
					 This happy event makes me recall the words of 'Cantata to Marshal Kim Il Sung', a song in praise of leader the servicepersons and civilians like to sing. Any desperate efforts of the enemy can never check the DPRK advancing toward a rosy future with this song for eternal victory.
					
					 I will faithfully uphold the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un with arms to fully demonstrate the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea."
					
					 Jong Jin Myong, another officer, said:
					
					 "Upon hearing the news, we, servicepersons, burst out into cheers.
					
					 The respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un represents the eternal banner of victory for Songun Korea. It is our unanimous desire, honor and happiness to hold him in high esteem as Marshal of the DPRK.
					
					 I will dedicate all my life to safeguarding the great leader and party and the precious socialist system."

articles.title: DPRK People Optimistic about Nation's Rosy Future
articles.content:
DPRK People Optimistic about Nation's Rosy Future
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are now very excited with the happy news that the dear respected Kim Jong Un was awarded the title of DPRK Marshal.
					 They are unanimous in saying that the future of Songun Korea will be rosier under his guidance.
					
					 Pak Kwang Chol, a section chief of the Academy of Agricultural Science, told KCNA:
					
					 "The conferment was what all the people had desired so ardently.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is fully possessed of distinguished disposition, qualification and personality on the highest level as a gifted illustrious commander. He was always together with leader Kim Jong Il in his inspection tours of military units and has led the Korean People's Army with superb strategy and commanding art.
					
					 He has decisively frustrated every anti-DPRK move of the imperialists with the same strong faith, will and grit as Kim Jong Il had.
					
					 Thanks to his wise guidance, the sovereignty of socialist Korea and the security of the people are reliably defended and the DPRK is fully displaying its dignity and might as an invincible military power."
					
					 Song Jong Ho, chief engineer of the Osan Co-op Farm in Jongju City, North Phyongan Province, said:
					
					 "Vivid in my memory is the venerable image of the dear respected Kim Jong Un who inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA on the New Year's Day.
					
					 He has continued inspection tours of military units for the national prosperity and people's eternal happiness.
					
					 The future of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea will be always crowned with victory and glory as Marshal Kim Jong Un leads the Korean revolution and there is the strong army intensely loyal to his command."

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon 
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Wednesday received a message of congratulation from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on his elevation to DPRK Marshal. 
					 The message noted that the awarding of the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un is the great honor and happiness for Chongryon officials and compatriots. 
					
					 It praised him as a peerlessly great man who started his revolutionary activities in the Korean People's Army by inheriting the traditions of Mt. Paektu and developed KPA into a strong and matchless revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu by successfully carrying forward the Songun idea and leadership of Generalissimos           Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Today Kim Jong Un has developed self-reliant defence industry at the ultra-modern level and guaranteed people's happiness by establishing the strongest independent principle in the world. The world progressive people admire him and we are full of national pride and honor, the message said, and went on:
					
					 Under your leadership we will frustrate the suppression moves of reactionaries in and outside Japan through all-Chongryon and all-Korean struggle and defend at any cost Chongryon, a legacy bequeathed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, out of patriotism. 
					
					 We will invigorate external activities by dint of your high authority and make a tangible contribution to achieving national reunification, a long-cherished desire of the nation, and building of a thriving nation and thus fulfill our patriotic duties.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates New AU Chairwoman
articles.content:
Congratulations to New AU Chairwomanan
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma upon her election as chairwoman of the African Union Commission at the 19th ordinary session of the Assembly of Heads of State and Government of the African Union.
					 Kim in the message said that her election was an expression of high trust and expectation of regional countries' people who are making positive efforts to settle by their own efforts the continent's issue free from outsiders' interference and realize peace, stability and development of Africa.
					
					 He reiterated the firm stand of the DPRK government to positively develop friendly and cooperative relations with the AU and its member states, wishing the chairwoman success in her responsible work for the development of the AU.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Congratulates New Albanian FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to New Albanian FM 
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a congratulatory message to Edmond Panariti on his appointment as new foreign minister of Albania on Tuesday.
					 The message hoped the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would develop favorably by joint efforts.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Anti-DPRK Invectives under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Anti-DPRK Invectives under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Thursday issued information bulletin No. 1004.
					 It said:
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak again made invectives against the north on July 16 when he took part in a ceremony for donation to the "Unification Jar" held at Chongwadae. The "Ministry of Unification" sponsored the event under the pretext of raising "funds for south-north unification". 
					
					 Lee said that "unification drew near" and "one will be able to see that unification is not far in the light of circumstances just as glow indicates sunset." He even said "unification means bigger Republic of Korea". 
					
					 Traitor Lee's invectives indicative of his daydream of confrontation of social systems were a hysteric fit and ridiculous action of a man more dead than alive, a mental patient obsessed with confrontation. 
					
					 As already known, Lee has become human vegetable being holed up in a back room of Chongwadae and forsaken even by his clan including the "Saenuri Party" in the face of the angry south Koreans at a revelation of a series of scandals by his relatives and close confidants.
					
					 His invectives at the farce of "Unification Jar" show that he is making last-ditch efforts to save his face that has been tarnished due to the failed "policy toward the north", divert elsewhere the public denunciation and incite confrontation. 
					
					 In June last year Lee said that "unification can come like a burglar at midnight" only to be ridiculed and denounced from all people as a dog barking at the moon. 
					
					 Traitor Lee put money into the "Unification Jar" and made invectives, an insult to the desire of the Korean nation for reunification. This clearly shows that he will never change his nature of confrontation even after many times of rebirth just as there is a saying "an eagle does not hatch a dove".
					
					 Even broad range of south Koreans, sickened at his appearance, ridiculed him, saying that "the end of MB is really at hand", "destruction of MB regime will come like a burglar" and that "the day is near when MB has to move to prison".
					
					 Lee Myung Bak at his deathbed seems to have gone mad. 
					
					 He, suffering from both dementia and brainstorm, gnaws at everything. He should be sent to Hades as early as possible before making the world dirtier. 
					
					 Days are numbered when he will meet a disgraceful end. 
					
					 "Unification Jar" shamelessly touted by Lee will be his grave or pot of his remains. 
					
					 The world will clearly see what a miserable end Lee will meet.

articles.title: Thai FM Delegation Visits Mangyongda
articles.content:
Thai FM Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Thai Foreign Ministry delegation led by Deputy Permanent Secretary Nuttavudh Photisaro visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Thursday.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President and his patriotic and revolutionary family members, the members of the delegation looked round the relics preserved at the old home.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Exhibition of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army, the Grand People's Study House, the Hana Musical Information Center, Pyongyang Metro, etc.

articles.title: Arrested Terrorist Interviewed
articles.content:
Arrested Terrorist Interviewed 
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Jon Yong Chol, defector to south Korea from the north, was interviewed by reporters at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday. He was arrested as he was trying to perpetrate hideous crime of destroying statues and monuments in the DPRK at the instructions of the U.S. and south Korean intelligence agencies. 
					 Present at the interview were reporters of DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and Chinese, Russian, U.S. and Japanese reporters. 
					
					 Overseas compatriots took part in the interview as observers. 
					
					 Jon Yong Chol spoke first. He lived in Songrim-dong No. 2, Songphyong District, Chongjin City of North Hamgyong Province before defecting to south Korea and joining in the moves for destroying monuments of the DPRK by the U.S. and south Korean intelligence agency. 
					
					 Jon said that he is an unpardonable criminal as he betrayed the motherland and took the criminal path. But he requested for a press conference thinking that he could not die before indicting the south Korean puppet regime for its heinous terrorist plot, he said, and went on:
					
					 Finding it hard to overcome temporary difficulties I had been engaged in illegal trading, broking, etc. I received money from a woman and helped her cross the border. Fear of punishment following its disclosure, I fled to China on April 24, 2010. 
					
					 Wandering here and there I was tempted by an agent of the south Korean Intelligence Service (IS) surnamed Pak and gave him information about the inner situation of the DPRK several times. Guided by him, I went to south Korea. After going through investigation by IS agents and "education" at "Hanawon" I could live in Thoegye-dong, Chunchon City in Kangwon Province of south Korea from March last year. 
					
					 Referring to the whole story about the course by which he received a terrorist mission from IS agents, Jon Yong Chol went on:
					
					 On around November 8 last year when I was frivoling time away without any job, I happened to meet Kim Song Min, who introduced him as representative of the anti-DPRK plot-breeding organization "Front for Liberation of North Korean People" in Seoul with the help of Ri Su Bok whom I got known at "Hanawon." 
					
					 Kim Song Min is a bad man who defected to south Korea after committing crimes. 
					
					 He formed a "statue demolition society" in the above-said front. He said that the U.S. and south Korean "government" authorities actively back the "society" with deep interest in it, and persistently persuaded me to join it if I want to make a huge amount of money. 
					
					 A few days later, Ko Tong Gyun who looked around 40 years old and a man surnamed Sim who looked about 50 called on me saying that they were sent by Kim Song Min. 
					
					 They said that they provided Kim Song Min with a lot of money for the formation of the "statue demolition society" and terrorist acts but every attempt failed, adding that I seemed to be most suitable to do the job. 
					
					 They were agents of the south Korean intelligence body who manipulate Kim Song Min behind the scene. 
					
					 Early in December last year, a "section chief" reminded me of the operation of the "statue demolition society" and briefed me on statue-blowing program and explosive device which was already in preparation. 
					
					 According to it, the explosive device (launcher) is latest equipment which looked like a thermos bottle capable of destroying at the target within 150-300 meters.
					
					 For 12 hours since the target was leveled, it will be in automatic state. When the man who set it switches it on by remote controller within 4-6 kilometers, it will be automatically launched to blow the target. 
					
					 They told me about the process of the "undertaking".
					
					 When the manufacture of explosive device was completed, the user first was to go to the area of China bordering the DPRK and be on standby after casing the target. The explosive device is a terrorist weapon under worldwide control. It consists of three parts. The three parts were to be smuggled separately through different routes and assembled on the spot before undergoing performance test. Finally it was to be handed over to the man who was to carry out the "undertaking". The terrorist would go to the DPRK via secret route and set the device ready to go off. When the exploding time is set on the spot, a satellite would photograph the area while staying in the sky above the area for 30 minutes or an hour before the explosion.
					
					 Jon Yong Chol then elaborated on how the south Korean puppet regime drew up the operation and tried to put it into practice. 
					
					 At about 8:30 a.m. on December 21 last year, the "section chief" and two agents again called on me to give me the operation program they had worked out, Jon said, adding:
					
					 According to it, I was to get disguised as smuggler and prepare two same boxes which looked like the box of personal belongings. I was to give one box with bribes in it to a smuggler who opened up the secret border path and carry another one containing the launcher to my mother's, to stave off his suspicion. 
					
					 I was to go up to the rooftop of an apartment before the statue and set the explosive device under the roof and then drop in at my mother's house. There I was to give a mobile phone containing the remote controller to my mother and request her to press the button of the mobile phone (button of remote controller) to call me if there is no news from me until 7 o'clock in the morning. Then I was to leave the house. 
					
					 I was to cross the border again to China with the smuggler's help and destroy the statue by pressing the button of another remote controller which I was carrying. 
					
					 According to the program, if my remote controller does not work for any impairment, my mother was to press the button to call me and then the statue will automatically be destroyed. 
					
					 Those agents sped to the U.S. saying that the program should finally be approved by the U.S. to get funded. 
					
					 On December 27, the agents called on me to say that the program was approved by the U.S. and I must succeed this time.
					
					 I set February as the month for demolition, but the "undertaking" had to be prolonged to April as the explosive device was not prepared.
					
					 They said if April 15 is set as the day of the "undertaking", it would spoil the atmosphere for celebrations of the Day of the Sun which the north had prepared with much effort, spread the rumor and stir up the mindset of the people in the north, adding that it will thus spark off a big furor. They emphasized that the incident should be spread to have been committed by the people in the DPRK not by outside forces.
					
					 This was the purpose sought by the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime. 
					
					 On March 24, 2012, I arrived in Yanji, China by air. 
					
					 But, the "undertaking" slated for April had to be postponed again because explosive device was not ready.
					
					 According to the "undertaking" program slated for 00:00 on July 27, the anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, I went to China again together with Ko Tong Gyun on May 5. 
					
					 When we were standing by in Yanji, Ko showed me the technical manual of the explosive device which included detailed information about assembling and use of the launcher and the results of explosion, etc. 
					
					 If succeeded, the explosion will reduce the target to ashes and the remaining parts of the explosive device will also go off. So, no one will be able to know about it except the one who remote-controlled it.
					
					 I, together with Ko, made preparations to open the border route as indicated by Sim.
					
					 At around 9:30 p.m. on May 13, I went to the opposite shore of Tuman River with Ko and Sim to assure them of the security of the secret border route.
					
					 That day Sim told me to wait for future instruction, saying blasting installations would be ready by the end of June.
					
					 In the meantime I constantly got in touch with Sim who returned to south Korea and a guy called Son Ki Man who introduced himself as chief of the Defense Security Command of the south Korean army.
					
					 This indicates the general mobilization of south Korean intelligence and plot-breeding organs.
					
					 As it is not bad to confirm the spot, I crossed the border at around 11:00 p.m. on June 18 and made my way to the border city in the DPRK side. After learning about the statue and its surrounding area, I was going back to the border side when I was arrested at around 2:00 a.m.
					
					 However, this did not mean an end to mean plot of the enemies.
					
					 Though I was detected and arrested, the U.S. and the south Korean intelligence organs would continue producing more Jon Yong Chol and make desperate efforts to put into practice hideous terrorist plots which they failed this time.
					
					 I came to clearly know through my experiences that their reckless acts are just as foolish a daydream as trying to sweep the sea with a broom.
					
					 Answering questions raised by journalists, Jon Yong Chol said that the south Korean regime set up "groups" and "organizations" with defectors to the south, other betrayers and wicked hostile elements, kicking up madcap anti-DPRK confrontation rackets.
					
					 He named the "Front for Liberation of North Korean People" as a typical example. This is a plot-breeding organization the purpose of which is to undermine the DPRK and "overturn its social system."
					
					 Recently, they are hatching a mean plot to infiltrate "special operation team" into the DPRK being assigned the duty of raising "turmoil" in it.
					
					 An organization specializes in writing graffiti on public buildings and spreading false rumors at markets in the north.
					
					 South Korean conservative media as well as "Radio Free North Korea" and "Radio North Korean Reform" mainly consisting of defectors to the south are being engaged in slandering the DPRK almost every day.
					
					 Meanwhile, the regime prods ultra-right conservative organizations and gangsters to hold "lectures", "round-table talks", "seminar" and the like every day to find fault with the DPRK.
					
					 Jon cited detailed facts to prove that the U.S. is being deeply involved in the recent hideous political-motivated terrorist case.
					
					 He confessed that he not only betrayed his family, home and the country but also perpetrated the high treason of hurting them, being preoccupied with getting money.
					
					 Those who get involved in the south Korean regime's terrorist acts and sabotage, being bribed by money, will only meet disgrace and death being branded as traitors, he said, adding: I would like to advise them to take a proper way for the country and people though belatedly.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean regime had better stop imprudent acts, well aware that they can never break the close single-minded unity in the DPRK, no matter how desperately they may try to escalate confrontation with it.

articles.title: Conference of DWUK Held
articles.content:
Conference of DWUK Held
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A conference of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) took place in Pyongyang on Thursday.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Yong Su, department director of the C.C., the WPK, and delegates elected at provincial (municipal) conferences of the DWUK.
					
					 Officials concerned were present at the conference as observers.
					
					 There was discussion on the tasks of the DWUK to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages as the eternal leader of the WPK and revolution and accomplish the Juche cause, Songun revolutionary cause generation after generation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. Discussion and decision on the revision of the rules of the DWUK were also made.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees, Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees, Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were awarded to intellectuals who achieved success in education and scientific researches and in pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology.
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday.
					
					 Title of academician was awarded to Kim Won Thaek, an examinant of Pyongyang College of Medicine of Kim Il Sung University, and Ko Kyong Dal, researcher of Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					
					 Title of candidate academician went to Ri Kun Bae and Choe Kum Chun, teachers of Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 Professorship was awarded to Hyon Yong Ra, researcher of the Nonferrous Metal Institute under the State Academy of Sciences, Ri Chu Gil, section chief of Kim Po Hyon University, and others while degree of doctor to head of department Rim Tok Gil and deputy head of department Ju Kwon U of Kim Il Sung University and others.
					
					 Associate professorship was conferred upon 129 persons.

articles.title: DPRK Athletes Expected to Make Good Results at 30th Olympiad
articles.content:
DPRK Athletes Expected to Make Good Results at 30th Olympiad
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has 51 athletes qualified for the 2012 London Olympic Games.
					 Some of them are well known at home and abroad for their good records at domestic and international tournaments.
					
					 Kim Un Guk and Yang Kyong Il won gold medals in men's weightlifting and wrestling respectively at world championships.
					
					 An Kum Ae, Jo Yong Suk and Kwon Un Sil who competed in women's judo, shooting and archery respectively at the 2008 Olympiad will try again at the 30th Olympiad. An Kum Ae won a silver medal at the 2008 Olympiad.
					
					 Han Kum Ok, Jong Chun Mi, Kim Kum Sok and Kim Kum Ok have also proved successful at international tournaments.
					
					 The DPRK bagged two gold, one silver and three bronze medals at the 29th Olympic Games.
					
					 It was at the 25th Olympiad that the DPRK made the highest results with four gold and five bronze medals.

articles.title: DPRK Students Win Two Gold Medals at IMO
articles.content:
DPRK Students Win Two Gold Medals at IMO
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK students won two gold medals at the 53rd International Math Olympiad (IMO).
					 They are Hong Chung Song and Choe Kwang of Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1.
					
					 The Olympiad held in Argentina brought together more than 540 students from 100 countries and regions.
					
					 Presented there were math problems in the fields of theory of numbers, algebra, geometry, combination and functional equation.
					
					 Hong and Choe solved difficult problems requiring high concentration and thinking power to win gold medals. 
					
					 They returned home by air Thursday.

articles.title: Far Infrared Radiator Efficient in Heat Treatment of Fabrics
articles.content:
Far Infrared Radiator Efficient in Heat Treatment of Fabrics
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Heat treatment by far infrared radiator has been applied to some factories under the Knitting Industry Management Bureau in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The heat treatment device is of high applicable value. Far infrared ray helps fabrics get resonance absorption of heat. The radiator makes it possible for cloth to pass through heat treatment process 1.5 times faster than before. And it needs less consumption of electricity.
					
					 The previous heat treatment device takes 2-3 hours to raise temperature up to 170 or 180 degrees Celsius, but only 30 minutes are enough for the new one.
					
					 With this new device heat treatment can be done in temperature 50 to 60 degrees Celsius lower than the previous one. The device is easily applicable with low cost.
					
					 Kim Yong Su, chief engineer at the Pyongyang Children's Knitted Goods Factory, told KCNA that the new device improves the quality of goods while sharply raising the production efficiency.

articles.title: Heavy Rain Lashes West Coastal Area of Korea
articles.content:
Heavy Rain Lashes West Coastal Area of Korea
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Heavy rain hit North and South Hwanghae provinces, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, affected by clouds hovering ahead of the arrival of typhoon 7.
					 From 00:00 Wednesday to 09:00 Thursday, 229 mm rainfall was witnessed in Kangryong County, 226 mm in Pyoksong County, 192 mm in Jaeryong County, 181 mm in Ongjin County, 170 mm in Sinchon County, 167 mm in Sinwon County and 166 mm in Haeju City, South Hwanghae Province and 200 mm in Unpha County and 158 mm in Hwangju County, North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Meanwhile, it rained 84 mm, 82 mm and 64 mm respectively in Jaeryong, Kangryong and Sinwon counties from 00:00 to 03:00 Thursday, 60 mm in Haeju City from 00:10 to 02:40 and 35 mm in Unpha County and 37 mm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, from 03:00 to 04:00.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 12th anniversary of the DPRK-Russia joint declaration. In July 2000 Russian President V.V. Putin visited the DPRK at the invitation of leader Kim Jong Il for the first time as the head of state of Russia and adopted the joint declaration.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article says the joint declaration serves as a milestone for DPRK-Russia friendship in the new century and an engine propelling the sound development of international relations and ensuring global peace.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Since its adoption the joint declaration has promoted the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries, displaying its vitality.
					
					 In recent years, the bilateral relations have become close in different domains based on joint declarations.
					
					 The development of the relations fully conforms with the interests of the peoples of the two countries, friendly neighbors, and is beneficial to ensuring peace and security of Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The Russian people are striving hard to achieve social stability and national unity and protect the country's security and interests. Russia is opposed to hegemony and high-handed policy in international arena and stands for multipolarization of the world and establishment of new, fair international order. It firmly stands against the U.S. missile defense system for world domination. These efforts of Russia precisely mean contribution to averting new arms race and space weaponization and defending global peace and security.
					
					 It is common desire of the two peoples to steadily develop traditional DPRK-Russia friendship.
					
					 The Korean people will as ever make efforts to develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries in the spirit of the joint declaration.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Brands Lee Myung Bak Family as Group of Thieves
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Brands Lee Myung Bak Family as Group of Thieves 
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Lee Sang Duk, elder brother of traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea, who acted as if he is invested with tremendous power, got the cold shoulder being snubbed by the public in the daytime recently.
					 As he was entering the Seoul Central District Court being summoned by it on the suspicion of receiving a large amount of illegal money, passers-by suddenly grabbed him by the throat and then pelted him with eggs. 
					
					 Lee Sang Duk, who styled himself "senior minister" of the present regime, became awkward in his appearance.
					
					 He, being tempted by lump sum, was bribed by two banks to help them deceive depositors. The banks have now gone bankrupt, enraging the people who lost their savings.
					
					 He is a kingpin of fraudulence, deception and corruption.
					
					 He received hundreds of millions of won from presidents of the Solomon Savings Bank and Mirae Savings Bank each. He is also head of the "six-men society" which played an active role in electing traitor Lee Myung Bak as "president" by employing whole gamut of fraud and cheatings. 
					
					 He swindled a large amount of public donation out of the president of the Broadcasting and Arts Promotion Agency and cheated various businesses out of their money. Therefore, he was publicly denounced as "department store of various kinds of scandals".
					
					 Not only Lee Sang Duk but other members of traitor Lee Myung Bak's family are thieves.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak collected and concealed staggering 800 billion won through all kinds of trickery and vicious irregularities including the case of fabricating BBK stock price and the case of buying Naegokdong residential building site.
					
					 Shortly ago, a restaurant which his wife had operated in the U.S. with billions of won investment went bankrupt. Lee appropriated compensation for it out of budget of the "government" for this year.
					
					  Cousins of Lee's wife caused the case of Pusan Savings Bank that sparked furor across south Korea. They received billions of won from the director general of the Seoul Bus Transport Trade Unions by promising him to help become a member of the "National Assembly". In the meantime, the traitor's senior brother-in-law illegally raised millions of money in just three years.
					
					 His grandchildren by his daughter also have a large amount of money. Immeasurable is the cases of corruption and irregularities committed by his relatives including the case of raising slush fund committed by parents of his daughter-in-law and the case of fabricating stock price by his son-in-law.
					
					 Dozens of his relatives are now being charged with corruption and irregularities or in prison.
					
					 Saveliev, expert of the Institute of the Far East of the Russian Academy of Sciences, said that Lee Sang Duk knocked down "president" Lee Myung Bak, his younger brother, this time.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak, who has no way-out of political and moral destruction, had better end his pitiful life of his own accord.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to mark the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 A seminar was held in Ethiopia, a lecture and photo exhibition in Romania, lectures and reading sessions in Uganda and Indonesia and a film show in South Africa between July 1 and 5.
					
					 Personages of different countries at the events praised the exploits by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The secretary general of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea praised Kim Il Sung as great man who founded the Juche idea to open a bright way for progressive people to follow and turned the DPRK into a powerful country. The President greatly contributed to the independence and development of African countries, he added.
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association said that though he passed away the President is alive in the hearts of mankind for the feats he performed for the Korean revolution and global independence.
					
					 A head of an Indonesian company said as follows:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung provided traditional friendship between Indonesia and the DPRK.
					
					 His august name is well known among Indonesians.
					
					 Kimilsungia will be in full bloom in Indonesia.
					
					 The secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party said that the exploits of Kim Il Sung will always be cherished in the hearts of mankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats, DPRK Introduced by Indian, Nepali Papers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats, DPRK Introduced by Indian, Nepali Papers
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Indian and Nepali papers carried special write-ups to mark the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Indian paper New Delhi Times on July 2 devoted one whole page to several articles with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In an article titled "Whole life of believing in people as in Heaven" the paper said the President regarded it as his maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven all his life. It went on:
					
					 He put forward the people as teacher and almighty being.
					
					  His life was full of boundless love and devotion to the people. He will always live in the hearts of mankind along with his lofty image as the benevolent father of the people and the great leader.
					
					 The Indian paper Defence and Humanity on July 7 in an article titled "Eternal reverence" cited facts to prove that he has been deeply praised by progressive mankind century after century.
					
					 A Nepali paper on July 6 carried an article titled "Songun politics, foundation for building a thriving socialist nation" with a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. The article said:
					
					 Modern Korea, an independent and prospering country, would be unthinkable without the feats the President performed in the revolutionary struggle.
					
					 The Korean people are praising generation after generation the feats of the President, who liberated the country and built an independent state where the people have become its master.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, who is identical to the President, turned the DPRK into an invincible power which always emerges victorious. The DPRK is the genuine people's country as it regards Songun as the basic political mode.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Fine Art Exhibition Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Fine Art Exhibition Opens in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and fine art exhibition was opened at the Far Eastern Fine Arts Museum in Khabarovsk City on July 12 to mark the 10th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's visit to the Far Eastern Region of Russia and the 1st anniversary of his visit to the Siberia and Far Eastern Region.
					 Displayed at its venue were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, books and photos showing the true picture of Songun Korea and fine art pieces associated with the resourcefulness and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremony.
					
					 The vice-minister of Culture of the Government of Khabarovsk Territory, the vice-director of the Bureau for International Economic Relations of the government and other speakers said the splendid exhibition will greatly contribute to developing the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between Russia and the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's historic visits to Russia laid a reliable foundation for boosting the friendly relations between the two countries, they noted.
					
					 The First Far Eastern International Military Band Festival held in May with the military band of the Korean People's Army attending left unforgettable memories to Khabarovsk citizens, they said, extending thanks again to the dear respected Kim Jong Un for having sent the wonderful military band. 
					
					 They expressed conviction that the ties between the Far Eastern Region and the DPRK would continue developing favorably in the political, economic, cultural and other fields.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Urged to Respect North-South Joint Declarations
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Urged to Respect North-South Joint Declarations
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Internet magazine of the "Commune Forum" Information Agency of Finland on July 10 carried an article denouncing the south Korean puppet regime for arresting and detaining Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification.
					 The article said: Ro Su Hui visited Pyongyang to take part in the event for marking the 100th day since the demise of leader Kim Jong Il. During his visit he conducted righteous activities for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country while visiting various places.
					
					 But the south Korean anti-reunification conservative regime arrested Ro on charges of violation of the "Security Law".
					
					 The "Security Law" of south Korea is an evil law ruthlessly violating and trampling down the freedom and rights of the people.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should set free Ro immediately and unconditionally, stop at once the suppression of all the pro-reunification people and the anti-reunification policy for confrontation and respect and positively implement the north-south joint declarations.

articles.title: Capitalinos felicitan al Mariscal  Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Capitalinos felicitan al Mariscal  Kim Jong Un
						
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 19 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el mitin de los capitalinos para congratularse del otorgamiento del titulo del mariscal de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					En la ocasion participaron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de instituciones del partido, fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios, los organos centrales, y los funcionarios de los dominios de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los heroes, los benemeritos laborales y trabajadores capitalinos, los estudiantes y jovenes, los compatriotas en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista.
					
					Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, dio lectura a la resolucion del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional y el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, de la RPDC.
					
					Orgullosos de contar de generacion en generacion con excelentes lideres y generales, todos los participantes aplaudieron efusivamente la resolucion aclamando "Vivas" y felicitando al General Insigne del Songun.
					
					En representacion del PTC, intervino Choe Thae Bok, miembro del BP y secretario del CC del PTC.
					
					Senalo que otorgar a Kim Jong Un el titulo del mariscal es la manifestacion de la absoluta fe y fidelidad de todo el ejercito y el pueblo a el quien adelanta el radiante porvenir de la prosperidad encargandose del destino del partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Elogio que Kim Jong Un es el sol de la Corea del Songun y general del monte Paektu quien realizo inmortales hazanas ante la epoca y la historia con su destacada y sabia direccion sucediendo las ideas y causas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y          Kim Jong Il.
					
					Agrego que gracias a la gran direccion de el, el PTC se fortalece y se desarrolla como partido glorioso de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y poderosas fuerzas orientadoras de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					El coronel general del EPC Yun Tong Hyon, en su discurso pronunciado en representacion de los oficiales y soldados del EPC, senalo que el otorgamiento del titulo del mariscal es el gran jubilo que hizo realidad el anhelo de todo el ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					Se refirio a que el Comandante Supremo abrio las perspectivas del fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas teniendo como mision de toda su vida continuar y cumplir la causa revolucionaria del Songun del Juche.
					
					Destaco que lograr cuanto antes la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche uniendose firmemente en torno al Comandante Supremo es el noble deber y obligacion de los oficiales y soldados del EPC, ejercito del lider y el partido.
					
					En representacion de la clase obrera, el presidente del CC de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, Hyon Sang Ju, dijo en su discurso que el evento de hoy es un gran jubilo para la nacion del Sol y tiene capital importancia politica en la lucha por el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Enfatizo que defender a costa de la vida la Direccion de la Revolucion uniendose firmemente en torno al partido y crear los milagros de la historia superando las severas dificultades constituyen una tradicion de la clase obrera de Corea.
					
					En representacion de los trabajadores agricolas, el presidente del Comite Central de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas Ri Myong Gil senalo que todos los trabajadores agricolas ven el maravilloso porvenir del campo socialista en la energica direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Juro registrar el cambio en la produccion agricola de este ano significativo guardando profundamente en el corazon el noble proposito del Mariscal de hacer vivir al pueblo en la opulencia socialista sin que vuelva a sufrir la escasez economica.
					
					En representacion de los jovenes y estudiantes, el presidente del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jon Yong Nam, destaco que todos los jovenes y estudiantes coreanos seran balas y bombas humanas para defender a costa de la vida al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, bandera de toda la victoria y la gloria de la Corea del Songun.
					
					Los jovenes coreanos seguiran confiando absolutamente en el Mariscal Kim Jong Un y avanzaran siempre adelante por la senda de la revolucion, finalizo. 
					
					En el acto fue aprobada la resolucion.

articles.title: Acto de juramento del ESIPC
articles.content:
Acto de juramento del ESIPC
						
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 18 el acto de juramento de los oficiales y los soldados del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea para dar maxima gloria y calurosa felicitacion al Mariscal de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del EPC y apoyar fielmente la direccion de el.
					  En la ocasion se dio lectura a la resolucion del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional y el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, de otorgar el titulo del Mariscal de la RPDC al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					  El ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo Ri Myong Su, los generales del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea Yun Hui Hwan, Ri Hi Su y el suboficial Kim Chol Hun intervinieron.
					
					  Los oradores enviaron al Comandante Supremo la maxima gloria y la felicitacion mas calurosa reflejando la gran emocion y la alegria de de todos los oficiales y soldados del ESIPC.
					
					  El otorgamiento del titulo del mariscal de la RPDC a el es una demostracion de la absoluta confianza y sinceridad de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo coreanos y sirve de un evento significativo en practicar la nueva era dorada de Corea de           Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, subrayaron y continuaron.
					
					  Por tener al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en el puesto cimero del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, la revolucion coreana mantiene firmemente aun en medio de la severa historia la pureza y la sucesion, demuestra el invencible poderio del socialismo al estilo coreano y abre la historia solemne de la nueva centuria de la Era Juche bajo la bandera del Songun.
					
					  El Maximo Dirigente quien posee la extraordinaria capacidad politica y los nobles rasgos de direccion, es el gran hombre sin par quien conduce a la brillante victoria la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la del Songun y el gran Sol de Corea del Songun.
					
					  Todos los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea concentraran todas sus fuerzas en  llevar adelante la tradicion de defensa a ultranza al lider y estableceran mas cabalmente en todo el ejercito el unico sistema de mando militar del Comandante Supremo.
					
					 Frente a la grave situacion en que los enemigos se atreven a ofender la maxima dignidad de la RPDC aseguraran por todos los medios  el prestigio la autoridad absolutos de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu y defenderan confiablemente la unidad monolitica de todo el ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					  En la ocasion fue aprobada la resolucion.
					
					  Los participantes ofrecieron el baile festivo reflejando el unanime sentimiento de los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea que envian al Maximo Dirigente la maxima gloria y la felicitacion.

articles.title: Chongryon felicita al Mariscal Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Chongryon felicita al Mariscal Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del otorgamiento a Kim Jong Un del titulo de mariscal de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) le dedico un mensaje de felicitacion.
					El texto senala que la investidura de Kim Jong Un con el titulo del mariscal les da el gran honor e incomparable felicidad a todos los funcionarios de la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en Japon.
					
					Califica a Kim Jong Un, quien heredo el linaje del monte Paektu e inicio sus actividades revolucionarias en el Ejercito Popular de Corea, de gran hombre que fortalecio el EPC como poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu continuando con exito la idea y la direccion mediante el Songun de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Senalo que hoy dia, los pueblos progresistas del mundo se admiran  ante la figura del Maximo Dirigente quien fortalece y desarrolla en el nivel sofisticado la autoctona industria de defensa nacional y garantiza la felicidad del pueblo manteniendo la postura mas independiente del mundo. 
					
					Subrayo que todos los funcionarios de la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en Japon frustraran la campana de represion de los reaccionarios internos y externos contra la Chongryon con la lucha organizada de todos los compatriotas y defenderan a toda costa esta organizacion, herencia patriotica dejada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Dinamizaremos las actividades exteriores con el alto prestigio de Kim Jong Un y cumpliremos con nuestra obligacion patriotica al realizar la reunificacion de la patria, maximo anhelo de la nacion coreana, y hacer aporte especial a la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista, concluyo.

articles.title: Terrorista arrestado Jon Yong Chol se entrevista con medios de prensa
articles.content:
Terrorista arrestado Jon Yong Chol se entrevista con medios de prensa
						
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este jueves en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la conferencia de prensa de Jon Yong Chol quien fue descubierto y arrestado mientras intentaba el peor acto de sabotaje y subversion contra la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el cumplimiento de la mision que le dieron EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas.
					  En la rueda de prensa participaron los periodistas de la rama de prensa e informacion de la RPDC y de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos en Japon) y los reporteros de China, Rusia, EE.UU. y Japon.
					
					  Asistieron en calidad de observador los compatriotas residentes en ultramar.
					
					  Primero, hizo uso de la palabra Jon Yong Chol que huyo al Sur de Corea cuando residia en el barrio no. 2 de Songrim del municipio de Songphyong de la ciudad de Chongjin de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte y se involucro en las operaciones de sabotaje y subversion anti-RPDC dirigidas por EE.UU. y el servicio de inteligencia del Sur de Corea.
					
					  Yo soy criminal imperdonable que traiciono a la patria, pero pedi esta entrevista de prensa porque no quiero morir sin delatar la siniestra conspiracion terrorista de la banda de titeres surcoreanos, dijo Jon y continuo:
					
					  Impotente de resistir la temporal dificultad de  vida, comence a vivir como negociante e intermediario. Cuando se revelo mi delito de haber ayudado a una mujer a que saliera ilegalmente del pais, escape a China el 24 de abril de 2010 profugo de la justicia.
					
					  Mientras vagabundeaba por aqui y por alla, conoci a un agente del servicio de inteligencia del Sur de Corea de apellido Pak.
					
					  Le entregue varias veces las informaciones sobre la situacion interior de la RPDC y pase al Sur de Corea por la ruta recomendada por el.
					
					  Llegado al Sur de Corea, estuve a prueba del servicio de inteligencia y pase un curso de "educacion" en la institucion llamada "Hanawon".
					
					  A partir de marzo del ano pasado, obtuve residencia en Thoegye-dong de la ciudad de Chunchon en la Provincia de Kangwon del Sur de Corea.
					
					  Voy a hablar desde ahora como cai en las garras de los agentes del servicio de inteligencia y recibi de ellos la mision terrorista de maxima envergadura.
					
					  Alrededor del 8 de noviembre del ano pasado cuando era desempleado, me encontre con Ri Su Bok, que conoci en "Hanawon". El me presento a Kim Song Min, representante del "Frente por la Liberacion del Pueblo Norcoreano" (FLPN), organizacion de conspiracion anti-RPDC, con quien me reuni en Seul.
					
					  Kim es connotado criminal que huyo al Sur de Corea tras cometer delito de traicion en la RPDC.
					
					  El me dijo que el FLPN organizo la "Sociedad para Destruir las Estatuas de Bronce" (erigidas en la RPDC) patrocinada por EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					  Me persuadio tenazmente para que me incorporara a los trabajos por el estilo si deseaba ganar una buena fortuna.
					
					  Unos dias despues, me visitaron los hombres enviados por Kim.
					
					  Uno se llamaba Ko Tong Gyun y el otro tenia el apellido Sim que me parecieron tener unos 40 y 50 anos de edad, respectivamente.
					
					  Ellos confesaron que organizaron la "Sociedad para Destruir las Estatuas de Bronce" instigando a Kim Song Min y le dieron mucho dinero para esa accion terrorista. 
					
					  Prosiguieron que fracasaron todos los atentados y me visitaron considerandome como persona adecuada para cumplir la mision.
					
					  Por cierto, ellos eran los agentes del servicio de inteligencia que controlaban por detras a Kim Song Min.
					
					  A principios de diciembre del ano pasado, el tipo llamado "jefe de seccion" me hizo recordar la operacion de la "Sociedad para Destruir las Estatuas de Bronce" y me explico el plan correspondiente y las especificaciones del aparato explosivo preparado para ese fin.
					
					  El aparato en forma de termo es un mecanismo sofisticado que puede destruir cualquier blanco que este a 150-300 metros de distancia.
					
					  Dentro de 12 horas desde que fuera apuntado el blanco, el aparato pasa al modo automatico.
					
					  Cuando el instalador aprieta el boton de control remoto en un radio de 4-6 kilometros, el aparato se lanza automaticamente para destruir el blanco.
					
					  Desde aqui me refiero al procedimiento de la "accion" (destruccion).
					
					  Una vez fabricado el aparato explosivo, el usuario tenia que entrar en la region china fronteriza con la RPDC y esperar luego de visitar en el terreno el objetivo a destruir. Dado que el aparato es un arma terrorista controlada mundialmente, sus 3 accesorios deberian introducirse ilegalmente por diferentes vias y ensamblarse en el terreno.
					
					  Luego, se haria el control de funcionamiento y pasaria al ejecutor de la "accion" que se habria infiltrado en territorio norcoreano por la via secreta.
					
					  El instalaria el aparato apuntando el blanco y avisaria la hora de voladura en el terreno. Entonces, se trasladaria al lugar un satelite artificial con 30 minutos de anticipacion para realizar la filmacion durante una hora aproximadamente.
					
					  Declarare desde ahora como los titeres surcoreanos trazaron la operacion y como se movieron para cumplirla.
					
					  Sobre las 8 y media del 21 de diciembre del ano pasado, el mencionado "jefe de seccion" y 2 agentes me visitaron nuevamente y me explicaron los detalles del plan de operacion.
					
					  Segun el plan, yo tendria que disfrazarme primero de contrabandista y preparar dos cajas iguales de carton para meter en una el explosivo y en la otra, los articulos de uso diario. Esta ultima se regalaria al contrabandista, que me guiaria por la ruta secreta en la frontera, y la otra caja se llevaria a la casa de mi madre para no levantar sospechas.
					
					  Luego, tendria yo instalar el aparato en el tejado de la azotea del apartamento frente a la estatua de bronce y pasar por la casa de mi madre para entregarle un telefono celular que lleva adentro el control remoto. Diria entonces a mi madre que me llamara apretando el senalado boton del telefono (control remoto del explosivo) si no tuviese noticia de mi parte hasta las 7 de la manana.
					
					  Cruzaria otra vez la frontera con la ayuda del contrabandista y una vez en China, destruiria la estatua de bronce usando el otro control remoto.
					
					  En el caso de que falle mi control remoto por alguna interferencia, el blanco resultaria destruido de todas maneras cuando mi madre use el telefono celular para llamarme.
					
					  Los agentes, que me visitaron, partieron de prisa con destino a EE.UU. diciendome que el plan puede ser financiado si es aprobado finalmente por los norteamericanos.
					
					  El 27 de diciembre, ellos volvieron con la noticia de aprobacion y me dijeron que yo debia cumplir sin falta el plan.
